data.description: Position Summary...What you'll do...IMMIGRATION SPONSORSHIP IS NOT AVAILABILE FOR THIS ROLE.The Sophomore Summit is a three-day event at our Home Office in Northwest Arkansas, offering insights into careers, culture, and connections at the Fortune 1 company. Invited students will get a deeper look into life at Walmart and interview for a 2027 internship. During the summit, you'll-Connect with leaders, associates, and former interns.-Network in both formal settings and fun social events.-Explore career paths across areas of the business.-Experience our brand-new campus, including wellness spaces like the Walton family whole health & fitness. WALMART GLOBAL TECH TRACK: SWE/ AI/ML Engineer About the RoleWalmart Global Tech is building AI systems that operate at massive scale—powering search, personalization, demand forecasting, supply chain optimization, and intelligent automation across the world’s largest retailer. We are looking for students with strong foundations in machine learning, deep learning, and software engineering who want to build production-grade AI models with real-world impact. What You’ll DoDesign, train, and evaluate machine learning models using large-scale datasetsApply deep learning techniques to structured and unstructured data (text, images, time series)Partner with engineers and product teams to deploy models into productionPerform error analysis, feature engineering, and model optimizationContribute to scalable ML pipelines and MLOps workflows Minimum QualificationsGraduating December 2027- August 2028Undergrad Enrolled in CS, EE, Math, Stats, or related fieldStrong programming skills in Python (experience with Java/Scala a plus)Solid understanding of machine learning fundamentalsExperience implementing ML models from scratch or using frameworksCoursework or projects demonstrating applied AI skills IMMIGRATION SPONSORSHIP IS NOT AVAILABLE FOR THIS ROLE #ECTECHㅤㅤㅤㅤ‎ Minimum Qualifications...Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. Preferred Qualifications...Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications.Primary Location...1901 Se 10Th Street, Bentonville, AR 72716-0001, United States of AmericaWalmart and its subsidiaries are committed to maintaining a drug-free workplace and has a no tolerance policy regarding the use of illegal drugs and alcohol on the job. This policy applies to all employees and aims to create a safe and productive work environment.
